sentences.en: For the first few years I didn't draw any salary at all.
sentences.cn: 在开始的几年里我分文未取。

sentences.en: He forecasts that average salary increases will remain around 4 per cent.
sentences.cn: 他预测平均工资增幅将保持在4%左右。

sentences.en: His salary is insufficient to meet his needs.
sentences.cn: 他的薪水不够应付需要。

sentences.en: His salary was obscene for three 40-minute shows a week.
sentences.cn: 他一周只有3次节目，每次40分钟，但他的薪水实在高得离谱。

sentences.en: I got a fantastic new job and my salary tripled.
sentences.cn: 我得到了一份非常好的新工作，薪水涨到了原来的3倍。

sentences.en: I was living in cloud-cuckoo-land about my salary expectations.
sentences.cn: 我对自己的薪水充满了不切实际的幻想。

sentences.en: It was becoming more and more difficult to live on his salary.
sentences.cn: 他越来越难以靠他的工资维持生计了。

sentences.en: My salary is paid directly into my bank.
sentences.cn: 我的工资直接拨到我的银行。

sentences.en: My salary was around £9,000 plus a car and expenses.
sentences.cn: 我的薪水大约是9,000英镑，还有一辆车和业务经费可支配。

sentences.en: Salary will be commensurate with experience.
The average salary for a teacher is $39,000 a year.
sentences.cn: 教师的平均工资是39,000美元一年。

sentences.en: the disproportion between the extra responsibilities and the small salary increase
sentences.cn: 额外的责任与小幅增加的薪金之间的不相称

sentences.en: They get a salary of $21,000 a year.
We're barely scraping by on my salary.
sentences.cn: 我们靠我的工资勉强度日。

sentences.en: With Betty's salary they barely made ends meet.
sentences.cn: 加上贝蒂的薪水，他们仅能勉强维持生计。

sentences.en: You get a big salary incentive and free board and lodging too.
sentences.cn: 你们能获得大笔激励性薪水，还可享受免费膳宿。

words.tran_cn: 给…薪水（salary的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 薪金政策的执行；薪酬管理

trans.tran_en: money that you receive as payment from the organization you work for, usually paid to you every month
